article:
Long ago, there was a little girl who was born into a poor family.
One day, the little girl wanted to decorate  a _ Her father became _ when he found that his three-year-old daughter had wasted plenty of wrapping paper  . He punished her.
The next morning, the little girl got up earlier than usual. She brought the box to her father and said, "This is _ you, Daddy. It's a Christmas present. " The father  felt sorry for his earlier behavior.  However; when he opened the box,. he saw that the box was . _ The father became angry again and shouted at his daughter, ' Don't you know when you give someone a present, there should be _ inside?" The little  girl looked up at her _ with tears in her eyes.  She cried, "Daddy, ifs not empty at all. I put my _ in the box. " Hearing this, the father put his arms around his little daughter. _ he asked for her forgiveness .
Only a short time later, an accident took the life of the child. It is said that the father _ that box by his bed for many years. Whenever he felt bad, he would take out a kiss and remember the love of his daughter.
